pitch.cc: That was pitch number 75 for Justin Verlander; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .239 average in the first 75 pitches but they hit .293 off him after that.
Justin Verlander really has his changeup working; he's allowing a .224 average against it this season and White Sox hitters are 0-for-5 against it in this game.
